Player History
Released by Cleveland on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1968...
Injured on 7/10/1969 with a Spasms Back, out for 6 weeks...

Injured on 7/29/1970 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/17/1972 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/11/1973, off Ron Klimkowski (PIT)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/19/1973...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1980, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 10/17/1981 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1981...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 1981...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1984, hitting .444 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from New York (N) to California on 7/31/1985 (Going to NYM: 1B J. Orta. Going to CAL: P R. Fontenot, 2B T. Foli)...
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Oakland in 1987...
